title: 求一份SX-Level修复版
author: 颅内开灯
txt_content: 有没有大佬有sx-level修复版的插件呀，每次这个都要掉级感觉好烦呀

replies.author: 梦之境
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... mp;authorid=1518859
这个作者已经修复了掉级问题，下载最新版即可

replies.author: 颅内开灯
replies.txt_content:
梦之境 发表于 2020-6-13 18:46
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=801326&page=1&authorid=1518859
这个作者已经修复了 ...

replies.author: 颅内开灯
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-6-13 18:46
设置SXLevelSetDefaultExp: false为true呢
这一条是指什么东西呢

replies.author: 颅内开灯
replies.txt_content:

设置SXLevelSetDefaultExp: false为true呢
